ResearchProjectDef.description:
Some herbs give intresting effects when burnt and inhaled. These may be useful when best leaves are selected, shaped in another form and inhaled directly when smoldering.
When you smoke the herb, it reveals you to yourself. - Bob Marley

ResearchProjectDef.description:
Refine psychoid into recreational drugs.
Just because it’s natural doesn’t mean you can be as stupid as you want with it. - Susan Lynn Peterson

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic cooking
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Learn to combine raw foods in new and interesting ways increasing their nutritional and enjoyability.
Stew's so comforting on a rainy day. Dodie Smith

ResearchProjectDef.label: Heat treatment
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Using heat, further refine clay into more resilient bricks.
Love is like a brick. You can build a house, or you can sink a dead body. Stefani Germanotta

ResearchProjectDef.description:
Learn how to make coal from wood.
Perhaps times definition of coal is the diamond. Khalil Gibran

ResearchProjectDef.description:
Craft basic tools used in fabrication and more advanced constructions.
Every tool carries with it the spirit by which it has been created. Werner Heisenberg

ResearchProjectDef.label: Defensive buildings
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Build basic defensive structures to better defend against threats.
Do not build a castle around one act of kindness, do not build an empire around one act of cruelty. Paul Bamikole

ResearchProjectDef.description:
Build tiled stone paths and floors by expanding and refining explored methods.
Under every stone lurks a politician. Aristophanes
